wtsproc.config: Vehicle is equipped with air conditioning.

step1.para: Remove complete air filter assembly to include turbocharger compressor inlet duct (air filter to turbo hose).
Remove charge air cooler pipe/hoses at turbocharger and charge air cooler.
Disconnect turbo exhaust outlet pipe at turbocharger.
Remove oil feed line from turbocharger and oil filter header. Cap fitting at oil filter header.
Remove oil return line (drain tube) from turbocharger and crankcase.
Disconnect air conditioning dryer from mounting bracket. Lay dryer aside for access (if applicable).
Remove nuts retaining turbocharger to exhaust manifold. Remove turbocharger.

note.para: Support turbocharger assembly during removal of mounting hardware to prevent injury or damage.

step1.para: Install turbocharger and gasket to exhaust manifold. Torque nuts to specification.
Connect air conditioning dryer to mounting bracket.
Install oil feed and oil return (drain tube) lines with new gaskets and O-rings.
Connect turbo exhaust outlet pipe to turbocharger.
Install charge air cooler pipe/hoses to turbocharger and charge air cooler.
Install complete air filter assembly to include turbocharger compressor inlet duct.
